Class CheckPhaseData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.view.GamePhaseData
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.view.CheckPhaseData
public class CheckPhaseData extends GamePhaseData
Represents the client-side data and behavior for the "Check Phase" of the game, where players validate and potentially fix their ship configurations. This phase allows the player to:
  • Verify the legality of their own ShipBoard
  • Remove illegal or undesired ship parts
  • Inspect enemy ships before the adventure phase
It also tracks the current phase state via a finite state machine and notifies the associated controller on updates.

  • Constructor Details

    • CheckPhaseData

      public CheckPhaseData()
      Constructs a new CheckPhaseData and initializes the default state to CHOOSE_MAIN_MENU. Initializes an empty map of enemy ships.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(ShipBoard shipBoard, ArrayList<String> playersUsername)
      Initializes the check phase with the player's ship and the usernames of all players. Also computes whether the ship is legal.
      Parameters:
      shipBoard - the player's current ship board
      playersUsername - the usernames of all players in the match

    • notifyListener

      Notifies the associated controller (if any) that this object has been updated.

      public CheckPhaseData.CheckState getState()

      Returns:
      the current state

    • updateState

      public void updateState()
      Advances to the next state based on current state logic. Some states (like REMOVE_SHIPCARDS_SETUP) cycle back to CHOOSE_MAIN_MENU. Notifies the listener after state change.
      Overrides:
      updateState in class GamePhaseData

    • setState

      public void setState(CheckPhaseData.CheckState state)

      Parameters:

    • handle

      public void handle(ServerAction action)
      Description copied from class: GamePhaseData
      Handles a ServerAction targeted at this phase's data.

      This method enables the application of the Visitor Pattern: the ServerAction knows how to manipulate this GamePhaseData through its loadData method.

      Specified by:
      handle in class GamePhaseData
      Parameters:
      action - the server-side action to process

    • isCheckPhase

      public boolean isCheckPhase()
      Description copied from class: GamePhaseData
      Indicates whether this is the check phase.
      Overrides:
      isCheckPhase in class GamePhaseData
      Returns:
      false by default, overridden in specific phase subclasses
